author: jleroux
msg: Adds a clean-uploads ant target, chains it with clean-all

author: astaric
msg: Handle a case where document has no field 'product'. (Whoosh 2.5 compatibility)
With Whoosh 2.4 all documents have a value in field 'product'
(our workaround to keep faceting from braking). In Whoosh 2.5 this is no longer
the case so this test failed.

author: markt

author: astaric
msg: SecurityFilter used to keep filters in lists, converting them to queries when subqueries property was accessed.
